raw_body: SIVAPRAKASAM – ESTHER – “Precious in the sight of the Lord is the death of his saints”. Beloved wife of the late Paul Sivaprakasam (Lever Bros). Loving daughter of the late David G and Florence Singanayagam,​ precious mother/​mother-in-law of Christopher and Shantini,​ Michael and Shashi,​ Naomi and Lakshman,​ Christine and Dinesh,​ adored grandmother of Daniel,​ Andrew,​ Ivan,​ Matthew,​ Anya,​ Christina and Jamie,​ beloved sister of the late Joyce,​ Queenie and Evangeline (Mala),​ was called to eternal rest in the arms of Jesus on 5 April 2024. Viewing at A.F. Raymond’s Funeral Parlour on Tuesday,​ 16 April from 10:00 a.m. to 12 noon and 5:00 p.m. to 7:00 p.m. Burial Service will be held on Wednesday,​ 17 April at 10:00 a.m. at the General Cemetery,​ Borella (General Christian Section). “Rest in peace and rise in glory”            025358
